title: testforblocks
description: Tests whether the blocks in two regions match.

fields.title: begin
fields.description: A `vector` [x y z] that along with `end` of two opposite corners of a rectangular region to test for.

fields.title: end
fields.description: Required. A `vector` [x y z] that along with `begin` of two opposite corners of a rectangular region to test for.

fields.title: destination
fields.description: Required. A `vector` [x y z] of the lower northwest corner to test for.

fields.title: mode
fields.description: Optional. Either `masked` where air blocks will match any destination, or default `all` which matches all blocks including air.

overloads.title: Test for blocks
overloads.description: Test whether the blocks in one area defined by `begin` and `end` match the blocks in a `destination` with an optional `test for blocks mode`.
